verses.verse: (A Psalm of David.) I will sing <S%H7891><s%> of lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> and justice, <S%H4941><s%> To Thee, O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> I will sing <S%H2167><s%> praises. <S%H2167><s%>

I will give <S%H7919><s%> heed <S%H7919><s%> to the blameless <S%H8549><s%> way. <S%H1870><s%> When <S%H4970><s%> wilt Thou come <S%H935><s%> to me? I will walk <S%H1980><s%> within <S%H7130><s%> my house <S%H1004><s%> in the integrity <S%H8537><s%> of my heart. <S%H3824><s%>

I will set <S%H7896><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> worthless <S%H1100><s%> thing <S%H1697><s%> before <S%H5048><s%> my eyes; <S%H5869><s%> I hate <S%H8130><s%> the work <S%H6213><s%> of those <S%H7846><s%> who <S%H7846><s%> fall <S%H7846><s%> away; <S%H7846><s%> It shall not fasten <S%H1692><s%> its grip <S%H1692><s%> on me.
A perverse <S%H6141><s%> heart <S%H3824><s%> shall depart <S%H5493><s%> from me; I will know <S%H3045><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> evil. <S%H9563><s%>

Whoever secretly <S%H5643><s%> slanders <S%H3960><s%> his neighbor, <S%H7453><s%> him I will destroy; <S%H6789><s%> No <S%H3808><s%> one who has a haughty <S%H1364><s%> look <S%H5869><s%> and an arrogant <S%H7342><s%> heart <S%H3824><s%> will I endure. <S%H3201><s%>

My eyes <S%H5869><s%> shall be upon the faithful <S%H539><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> that they may dwell <S%H3427><s%> with me; He who walks <S%H1980><s%> in a blameless <S%H8549><s%> way <S%H1870><s%> is the one <S%H1931><s%> who will minister <S%H8334><s%> to me.

He who practices <S%H6213><s%> deceit <S%H7423><s%> shall not dwell <S%H3427><s%> within <S%H7130><s%> my house; <S%H1004><s%> He who speaks <S%H1696><s%> falsehood <S%H8267><s%> shall not maintain <S%H3559><s%> his position <S%H3559><s%> before <S%H5048><s%> me.

Every morning <S%H1242><s%> I will destroy <S%H6789><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the wicked <S%H7563><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> So as to cut <S%H3772><s%> off <S%H3772><s%> from the city <S%H5892><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> those who do <S%H6466><s%> iniquity. <S%H205><s%>
